title: True Minded Gaming(Diamond) is looking for a Jungler and Mid
body:
Hey guys, True Minded Gaming is looking for a Diamond 5+ Jungle as well as a mid lane. This team is extremely serious and has the goals to go far, as well as the ability to do so with our coaching staff. We are looking for players who are willing to take critcism, learn from our coaches, and have the goals that we do. Players that want to join this team must be at least 16, Diamond, and have consistent internet and a working mic. It is also required that you have an extremely serious and dedicated mentality. If you are interested in joining this team, please fill out this short application and we will add you in game.

IGN:
Current rank:
Peak rank:
Role:
Strengths:
Weaknesses:
Timezone:
Availability:
Age:
Any questions:
Anything extra:

IGN: Paper Bag
Current rank: Diamond 5
Peak rank: Diamond 3
Role: Jungle
Strengths: Efficient, Strong baron calls, Diverse champion pool
Weaknesses: French native
Timezone: EST
Availability: Every evening and all weekend long
Age: 19
Any questions: Are you guys willing to join tournaments and/or leagues ?
Anything extra: I speak fluent English even if I am a french Canadian.

IGN: FR3NCHT04ST on alt mostly (Boomkin)
Current rank: Diamond 4
Peak Rank Diamond 4
Role: Mid
Strengths: Incredible Game sense, Teamfighting, roaming, Communication, Usually Shotcaller
Weaknesses: Champ pool (can't play all mids to best potential)
Timezone: Central (Texas)
Availability: after 11:30 A.M, college class
Age: 20
Any Questions: None
Anything Extra: Have not attempted to climb Diamond 4 but on other accounts ranked 28 NA as Irelia (FR3NCHTO4ST)  and rank 55 NA Taliyah (streetjustice)

IGN: Shangdi DMW

Weaknesses: Shotcalling, Avoiding Ganks
Timezone: CST
Availability: Any
Age: 18
Any questions: None
Anything extra: Have a history of competing with 5's teams at a much higher elo than myself
